articles.content:
Cheryl has been spotted donning a pair of wedged trainers as she arrived at rehearsals for her West End theatre debut in London.

articles.title: Shotgun Wedding review – Jennifer Lopez hits the spot in goofy romcom - The Guardian
articles.description: In this likable spin on the genre, Lopez’s wedding to a sensitive baseball player runs aground when a boatful of armed men arrive
